TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataBindingCollectionEditor extends System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("Use of this type is not recommended because DataBindings editing is launched via a DesignerActionList instead of the property grid. http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=14202")

Docs.summary: Provides a user interface for editing a collection of data bindings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DataBindingCollectionEditor> class is obsolete. At design time, editing of data bindings is accomplished from a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerActionList> instead of the property grid. For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.ActionLists%2A>.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: public override object EditValue (System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, IServiceProvider provider, object value);
.method public hidebysig virtual instance object EditValue(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context, class System.IServiceProvider provider, object value) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that identifies the component or control the collection belongs to.
Docs.summary: Edits the value of the specified data-binding collection using the specified service provider and context.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance valuetype System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle GetEditStyle(class System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext context) cil managed

Docs.param: An object that identifies the component or control to retrieve the edit style for.
Docs.summary: Gets the editor style used by the method.
Docs.returns: A object that specifies the editor style of the component or control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This editor provides a modal editor style.
